component.name: e2 SAT Editor
component.summary: Satellite channel lists editor: Enigma2, Neutrino, dreambox

description.p: e2 SAT Editor is a satellite channel lists editor with tabbed nav, for Enigma2, Neutrino, dreambox lists.

With this software you can upload, download and edit channel lists of your Enigma or Neutrino decoder, merge channel lists, convert lists, export and import channels with spreadsheets, edit services, flags, transponders, markers and picons, channel logos.
It supports Enigma2, Lamedb 4 and Lamedb 5 channel lists (2.4, 2.5, 2.3, 2.2), Enigma1, Neutrino Zapit XML channel lists (api v1, v2, v3, v4).

ul.li: Important fixes: remove channel reference, remove service, Drag and Drop logic, tree column widths

Translations: Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan, Czech, Danish, German, Spanish, Persian, Finnish, French, Gaelic, Galician, Hebrew, Croatian, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Lithuanian, Latvian, Dutch, Norwegian Nynorsk, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Chinese (China), Chinese (Taiwan)
Fix: file operations, edit service fields, XML encoding
Improvements: tree views, log inspector, icon resources
